item.title: Angus add a quote by H.G. Wells
item.description: "Moral indignation is jealousy with a halo." -- H.G. Wells

item.title: Angus add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The man who does not read has no advantage over the man who cannot read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Angus add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Angus add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "I have never let my schooling interfere with my education." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Angus add a quote by Malcolm X
item.description: "I'm for truth, no matter who tells it. I'm for justice, no matter who it is for or against. I'm a human being, first and foremost, and as such I'm for whoever and whatever benefits humanity as a whole." -- Malcolm X

item.title: Angus add a quote by Malcolm X
item.description: "My alma mater was books, a good library.... I could spend the rest of my life reading, just satisfying my curiosity." -- Malcolm X

item.title: Angus add a quote by Saul Bellow
item.description: "A great deal of intelligence can be invested in ignorance when the need for illusion is deep." -- Saul Bellow

item.title: Angus add a quote by Terry Goodkind
item.description: "Love is a passion for life shared with another person. You fall in love with a person who you think is wonderful. It's your deepest appreciation of the value of that individual, and that individual is a reflection of what you value most in life. Love, for sound reasons, can be one of life's greatest rewards." -- Terry Goodkind

item.title: Angus add a quote by Malcolm X
item.description: "We need more light about each other. Light creates understanding, understanding creates love, love creates patience, and patience creates unity." -- Malcolm X

item.title: Angus add a quote by Malcolm X
item.description: "You're not to be so blind with patriotism that you can't face reality. Wrong is wrong, no matter who does it or says it." -- Malcolm X

item.title: Angus add a quote by Malcolm X
item.description: "The media's the most powerful entity on earth. They have the power to make the innocent guilty and to make the guilty innocent, and that's power. Because they control the minds of the masses." -- Malcolm X

item.title: Angus add a quote by Noam Chomsky
item.description: "Either you repeat the same conventional doctrines everybody is saying, or else you say something true, and it will sound like it's from Neptune." -- Noam Chomsky

item.title: Angus add a quote by Noam Chomsky
item.description: "If we don't believe in freedom of expression for people we despise, we don't believe in it at all." -- Noam Chomsky

item.title: Angus add a quote by Noam Chomsky
item.description: "The whole educational and professional training system is a very elaborate filter, which just weeds out people who are too independent, and who think for themselves, and who don't know how to be submissive, and so on -- because they're dysfunctional to the institutions." -- Noam Chomsky

item.title: Angus add a quote by Dan Simmons
item.description: "To see and feel one's beloved naked for the first time is one of life's pure, irreducible epiphanies. If there is a true religion in the universe, it must include that truth of contact or be forever hollow. To make love to the one true person who deserves that love is one of the few absolute rewards of being a human being, balancing all of the pain, loss, awkwardness, loneliness, idiocy, compromise, and clumsiness that go with the human condition. To make love to the right person makes up for a lot of mistakes." -- Dan Simmons

item.title: Angus add a quote by Dan Simmons
item.description: "In the beginning was the Word. Then came the fucking word processor. Then came the thought processor. Then came the death of literature. And so it goes." -- Dan Simmons

item.title: Angus add a quote by John Keats
item.description: "Whatever the imagination seizes as Beauty must be truth -whether it existed before or not" -- John Keats

item.title: Angus add a quote by Noam Chomsky
item.description: "The smart way to keep people passive and obedient is to strictly limit the spectrum of acceptable opinion, but allow very lively debate within that spectrum...." -- Noam Chomsky

item.title: Angus add a quote by John Keats
item.description: "I have been astonished that men could die martyrs for their religion-- I have shuddered at it, I shudder no more. I could be martyred for my religion. Love is my religion and I could die for that. I could die for you. My Creed is Love and you are its only tenet." -- John Keats

item.title: Angus add a quote by Rene Daumal
item.description: "I'm very much aware I can't think. I'm a poet." -- Rene Daumal

item.title: Angus add a quote by Marguerite Yourcenar
item.description: "Men who care passionately for women attach themselves at least as much to the temple and to the accessories of the cult as to their goddess herself." -- Marguerite Yourcenar

item.title: Angus add a quote by Marguerite Yourcenar
item.description: "There are books which one should not attempt before having passed the age of forty." -- Marguerite Yourcenar

item.title: Angus add a quote by Donald Barthelme
item.description: "The aim of literature ... is the creation of a strange object covered with fur which breaks your heart." -- Donald Barthelme

item.title: Angus add a quote by Donald Barthelme
item.description: "See the moon? It hates us." -- Donald Barthelme

item.title: Angus add a quote by Sara Teasdale
item.description: "In my heart's most secret place, I pity them as angels do." -- Sara Teasdale

item.title: Angus add a quote by Marguerite Yourcenar
item.description: "This city belongs to ghosts, to murderers, to sleepwalkers. Where are you, in what bed, in what dream?" -- Marguerite Yourcenar

item.title: Angus add a quote by Lafcadio Hearn
item.description: "The Shadow-maker shapes forever." -- Lafcadio Hearn

item.title: Angus add a quote by Laura Benet
item.description: "If the sum of living be love's fee, Tremble. You are my one eternity." -- Laura Benet

item.title: Angus add a quote by Marguerite Duras
item.description: "Very early in my life it was too late." -- Marguerite Duras

item.title: Angus add a quote by Rene Daumal
item.description: "This place has only three exits, sir: Madness, and Death." -- Rene Daumal
